name: Testing Commence
description:
Let the Testing Commence!
Chosen as a guinea pig your only goal is - to survive!

Survive the testing set up by the open committee of enemy and boss design and help them research best buffs and debuffs that they should implement in their skeleton designs.

Every corpse counts!

A submission for Score Space Jam #13
Music link: 4 Chiptunes (Adventure) | OpenGameArt.org
